cast.name: 爱因德·伊恩沃德 Eindride Eidsvold
比约恩·桑德奎斯特 Bjørn Sundquist
尼尔斯·奥勒·奥特布罗 Nils Ole Oftebro
Niels Petter Solberg Niels Petter Solberg
马莉卡·拉格尔克朗斯 Marika Lagercrantz
斯威尔·安克·奥斯达 Sverre Anker Ousdal

writer.name: 莱杜尔夫·里桑 Leidulv Risan

director.name: 特里斯坦·德微·柯尔 Tristan DeVere Cole

introduction: Sundquist and Eidsvold play the two deep sea divers, who agree to do a quick unscheduled dive before taking their Christmas vacation, to help an oil company who's got a oil-valve caught in a trawl. The dive is to take only 5 minutes, and the divers will get a nice bonus. But things go wrong. The diving bell gets tangled in the trawl, and while trying to hoist up the bell, they tear asunder the oxygen tanks. Suddenly the bell is stuck, and the crew is unable to get it up. Caught in a diving bell at the bottom of the sea, rapidly running out of air, both the divers and the crew on the surface are racing against time to find a solution; how to get the two men up ALIVE!
